item.title: Build homepage with Hugo and Github
item.description: Why Homepage? I have build website lots of times, but I did’t insist on it.

item.title: Git Usage
item.description: SourceTree SourceTree is a very good tool. It provides an interface for diff and merge in git. It is also eazy to show the branch in the game. Basic command I have to understand the basic command so that when we click the button, we could know what happend behand it.
